meanings.definition: The period of time between afternoon and night.
meanings.sent1: In the evening, the sun sets and the stars come out.
meanings.sent2: I like to go for a walk in the evening after dinner.
meanings.sent3: During the evening, the sky turns beautiful shades of pink and orange.
meanings.sent4: The evening sky was a canvas painted with hues of purple and gold.
meanings.sent5: The evening air was cool and refreshing, perfect for a leisurely stroll.

meanings.definition: The latter part of the day and early part of the night.
meanings.sent1: We decided to have a picnic in the evening when the sun was setting.
meanings.sent2: The evening is a peaceful time to relax and unwind after a busy day.
meanings.sent3: During the evening, the neighborhood streets are quiet and serene.
meanings.sent4: The evening brought a sense of calm and tranquility to the bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The evening shadows grew longer as the day slowly faded into night.

meanings.definition: The time of day between sunset and bedtime.
meanings.sent1: I like to read a book in the evening before going to sleep.
meanings.sent2: During the evening, the crickets chirp softly in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The evening is a cozy time to snuggle up with a blanket and watch a movie.
meanings.sent4: The evening sky was a blanket of stars twinkling above.
meanings.sent5: The evening breeze carried the scent of flowers from the garden into the house.
